amendment.description: To limit the conversion of funds for the Department of Veterans Affairs program to improve retention of housing by formerly homeless veterans and veterans at risk of becoming homeless.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3032 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3032 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Nelson to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4336) To limit the conversion of funds for the Department of Veterans Affairs program to improve retention of housing by formerly homeless veterans and veterans at risk of becoming homeless.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3032 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3032 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Nelson to Amendment SA 2910.
